summary: Concept Delta - An MHT-CET practice test platform with a navy/light blue color scheme, featuring routes for home, dashboard, admin, about, test, and result pages. Initial focus on layout structure, navbar with logo, footer, and hero section.
architectural_notes: Navy (#1e3a8a) and light blue (#60a5fa) color scheme with white backgrounds
Gradient button component transitioning from navy to light blue
Route structure: home, dashboard, admin, about, test/:id, result/:id
AuthContext pattern for global auth state management
Protected routes with redirect logic for unauthenticated users
Role-based access control with 'student' and 'admin' roles via AuthContext
Admin access uses ADMIN_PRINCIPALS array with includes() check instead of single principal comparison
Question creation supports optional images for both questions and options (text OR image required)

existing_features.title: Create routing structure with six pages: Home (/), Dashboard (/dashboard), Admin (/admin), About (/about), Test with dynamic ID parameter (/test/:id), and Result with dynamic ID parameter (/result/:id). All pages should be empty placeholders initially.
